Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People have a lot to look forward to in the upcoming Federal Budget. Sky News expects "spending restraint" to keep inflation under control while Prime Minister Albanese has promised no cuts to infrastructure spending. Meanwhile low-income households will receive energy bill relief but no word on funding for mega-pumped hydro projects. Sadly there's no miracle in store for Australia's coffers. Still Questacon is set to receive a whopping $60m in the 2023-2024 Budget. Science and technology education assemble!
